Description.Text: Accomodation
Product
Equipement

Description.Title: 23 cabins
Description.Text: • 23 double cabins
LOWER DECK

Description.Title: RESTAURANT
Description.Text: Located on the main deck, the restaurant is where all meals are served during your cruise. The atmosphere is casual but elegant.

Description.Title: 25 cabins
Description.Text: • 25 double cabins
MAIN DECK

Description.Title: RECEPTION DESK
Description.Text: Perfect place to meet up with friends before excursions or to ask any information you may need to the staff. The Gift Shop is also located here, you'll find a wide assortment of souvenirs, CroisiEurope products and post cards.

Description.Title: LOUNGE BAR WITH DANCEFLOOR
Description.Text: The tastefully decorated lounge, is located at the front of the ship and offers panoramic views. Cocktails and games, dancing, and other forms of entertainment all happen here.

Description.Title: 22 cabins
Description.Text: • 22 double cabins
EMBARKATION DECK

Description.Title: PIANORAMABAR
Description.Text: Unwind in this pleasurable place with a cocktail in hand while listening to the piano. And maybe we will get the pleasure to listen to your talent…

Description.Title: TERRACE
Description.Text: Located at the back of the ship, you can easily meet up with friends and relax while enjoying the view.

Description.Title: 29 cabins
Description.Text:
• 1 single cabin
  • 1 cabin for people with reduced mobility
  • 27 double cabins
UPPER DECK

Description.Title: FITNESS
Description.Text: Start your day by joining us for a morning fitness class on the sun deck.

Description.Title: JACUZZI
Description.Text: Rest and relax in the Jacuzzi while enjoying the beautiful landscapes.

Description.Title: BAR
Description.Text: Why not enjoy a cocktail at our bar? A good place to spend time socializing indoors with friends or family.

Description.Title: SUN DECK
Description.Text: Take advantage of the sun deck to relax! It is equipped with chairs and deckchairs, allowing you to cool off while enjoying a panoramic view of the magnificent landscapes.
SUN DECK

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Cabin equipped with two beds (with optional twin-bed configuration), private bathroom with shower and bath products, satellite TV, safe, hairdryer and radio. Located on the reception deck, it offers a panoramic view of the landscapes.
Reception deck 2 beds

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Comfortable cabin equipped with two beds that can be separated, private bathroom with shower and bath products, satellite TV, safe, hairdryer and radio. Located on the reception deck, it offers a panoramic view of the landscapes.
Reception deck 2 adjustable twin beds

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Comfortable cabin equipped with two beds that can be separated, portholes, private bathroom with shower and bath products, satellite TV, safe, hairdryer and radio. It is located on the lower deck.
Lower deck 2 adjustable twin beds - portholes

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Comfortable cabin equipped with two beds that can be separated, portholes, private bathroom with shower and bath products, satellite TV, safe, hairdryer and radio. It is located on the main deck.
Main deck 2 adjustable twin beds - portholes

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Cabin equipped with two beds, portholes, private bathroom with shower and bath products, satellite TV, safe, hairdryer and radio. It is located on the main deck.
Main deck 2 beds - portholes

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Cabin equipped with one double bed, private bathroom with shower and bath products, satellite TV, safe, hairdryer and radio. Located on the upper deck, it offers a panoramic view of the landscapes.
Upper Deck 1 double bed

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Cabin equipped with one single bed, private bathroom with shower and bath products, satellite TV, safe, hairdryer and radio. Located on the upper deck, it offers a panoramic view of the landscapes.
Upper deck 1 single bed

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Comfortable cabin equipped with two beds that can be separated, private bathroom with shower and bath products, satellite TV, safe, hairdryer and radio. Located on the upper deck, it offers a panoramic view of the landscapes.
Upper deck 2 adjustable twin beds

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Comfortable cabin adapted for passengers with reduced mobility and equipped with one king size bed, private bathroom with shower and bath products, satellite TV, safe, hairdryer and radio. Located on the upper deck, it offers a panoramic view of the landscapes.
Upper Deck 1 double bed - disabled person
MV La Belle de l'Adriatique
The MV La Belle de l'Adriatique sails along maritime coasts : Croatia, Greek islands, Montenegro and Albania.

Description.Title: EQUIPMENTS
Description.Text:
• TV
  • Telephone (for internal calls only)
  • Bathroom with shower and toilet
  • Towels
  • Safe
  • Independent air-conditioning
  • Electricity 220V
  • Wi-Fi

Please note that there is no laundry service on board the ship.

Description.Title: DESCRIPTION_MARKETING
Description.Text:
The Undeniable European Leader in the Cruise Industry:
- More than 40 years of experience, more than 50 ships: CroisiEurope is the European frontrunner of river cruises
- A wide variety of choices: The French canals, European rivers, ocean tours, and exotic destinations (Africa, Russia, and Asia) with small-scale, hi-tech ships accommodating 16 to 200 passengers
- Exclusive destinations include: The Loire, Guadalquivir, and Tisza Rivers—as well as “Paris by Night” on the Seine, or Lake Kariba...
- Themed cruises: Gastronomic, music, hiking, biking and family
- Warm, international ambiance with La French Touch. Our motto: Highest quality at the best price.

CroisiEurope’s Highlights:
- Drinks included with onboard meals and at bar (depending on the cruise)
- Free Wi-Fi
- Copious, first-rate buffet breakfasts and fine French dining
- Individual visits excursions or reduced all-included package prices; headsets included (depending on the cruise)
- Specially themed evenings: traditional entertainment; gala dinner.

Description.Title: DESCRIPTION_MARKETING
Description.Text:
The Undeniable European Leader in the Cruise Industry:
- More than 40 years of experience, more than 50 ships: CroisiEurope is the European frontrunner of river cruises
- A wide variety of choices: The French canals, European rivers, ocean tours, and exotic destinations (Africa, Russia, and Asia) with small-scale, hi-tech ships accommodating 16 to 200 passengers
- Exclusive destinations include: The Loire, Guadalquivir, and Tisza Rivers—as well as “Paris by Night” on the Seine, or Lake Kariba...
- Themed cruises: Gastronomic, music, hiking, biking and family
- Warm, international ambiance with La French Touch. Our motto: Highest quality at the best price.

CroisiEurope’s Highlights:
- Drinks included with onboard meals and at bar (depending on the cruise)
- Free Wi-Fi
- Copious, first-rate buffet breakfasts and fine French dining
- Individual visits excursions or reduced all-included package prices; headsets included (depending on the cruise)
- Specially themed evenings: traditional entertainment; gala dinner.

Description.Title: Image slider
Description.Text: Image Slider

Description.Title: RESTAURANT
Description.Text: The restaurant serves contemporary, international cuisine in a warm and elegant atmosphere. Whilst breakfast and lunch are served buffet style, dinner will be on plate service basis.

Description.Title: 11 cabins
Description.Text:
• 10 Horizon cabins - 17 m²
  • 1 Horizon cabin with reduced mobility - 17 m²
DECK 3

Description.Title: EXPLORER LOUNGE AND BAR
Description.Text: Enjoy panoramic views of the landscapes in the Explorer Lounge where all conferences and any planned presentation on the program take place. During cocktail hours and after dinner, musicians will perform for your entertainment.

Description.Title: RECEPTION DESK
Description.Text: Perfect place to meet up with friends before excursions or to ask any information you may need to the staff.

Description.Title: 24 cabins
Description.Text: • 24 Horizon cabins - 17 m²
DECK 4

Description.Title: SWIMMING POOL
Description.Text: On warm climate cruises, outdoor life on board revolves around the Pool Deck located aft of the ship. People socialize and lounge at the Pool Bar and around the very refreshing swimming pool, perfect for cooling off in warm weather. Its relaxing atmosphere will also be ideal in cooler weather.

Description.Title: GRILL RESTAURANT
Description.Text: Located around the swimming pool, this restaurant offers an alternative to the other onboard catering areas. An adjoining terrace on deck 6 welcomes you to admire the magnificent landscapes.

Description.Title: DISCOVERER LOUNGE BAR
Description.Text: The Discoverer Lounge offers unlimited tea and coffee aboard your ship. This comfortable seating area with plenty of natural light is an ideal place to relax and reflect on the day’s activities and future excursions to come.

Description.Title: 16 cabins
Description.Text: • 16 Horizon cabins - 17 m²
DECK 5

Description.Title: 13 cabins
Description.Text:
• 4 Panorama suites - 25 m²
  • 8 Riviera suites - 26 m²
  • 1 Ocean suite - 38 m²
DECK 6

Description.Title: SUN DECK
Description.Text: Take advantage of the sun deck to relax and enjoy the views of the landscapes.

Description.Title: FITNESS CENTER
Description.Text: The Belle des Océans is equipped with a fitness room that is open daily.

Description.Title: BEAUTY SALON
Description.Text: Maintain your fresh look throughout your cruise thanks to the services proposed in the Beauty salon: manicure, pedicure and massages. Appointments for these services may be made onboard the ship.
DECK 7

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable cabin equipped with two single beds or one double bed, storage spaces, seating area with armchairs, marbled bathroom with walk-in shower, dressing room with personal safe, desk, flat screen TV, fridge, hairdryer and telephone. Enjoy the passing scenery through two porthole windows.
HORIZON CABINS (DECK 3)
HORIZON SUITE (DECK 3) - DISABLED PERSON

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable cabin equipped with two single beds or one double bed, storage spaces, marbled bathroom with walk-in shower, dressing room with personal safe, desk, flat screen TV, fridge, hairdryer and telephone. Capture passing ocean scenes through your panoramic window while relaxing in the armchairs of the seating area.
HORIZON CABIN (DECK 4)

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable cabin equipped with two single beds or one double bed, storage spaces, marbled bathroom with walk-in shower, dressing room with personal safe, desk, flat screen TV, fridge, hairdryer and telephone. Capture passing ocean scenes through your panoramic window while relaxing in the armchairs of the seating area.
HORIZON CABIN (DECK 5)

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable suite equipped with two single beds or one double bed, storage spaces, marbled bathroom with walk-in shower, dressing room with personal safe, living room with sitting area including a sofa bed for one child (up to 10 years old), desk, flat screen TV, fridge, espresso machine, hairdryer and telephone. Complete with a private balcony with wooden parquet, patio furniture and floor-to-ceiling glass door. Capture passing ocean scenes through your large panoramic window while relaxing in the armchairs of the seating area.
OCEAN SUITE WITH 1 SPARE BED (DECK 6)

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable suite equipped with two single beds or one double bed, storage spaces, marbled bathroom with walk-in shower, dressing room with personal safe, desk, flat screen TV, fridge, hairdryer and telephone. Capture passing ocean scenes through your large panoramic window while relaxing in the armchairs of the seating area.
PANORAMA SUITE (DECK 6)

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable suite equipped with two single beds or one double bed, storage spaces, marbled bathroom with walk-in shower, dressing room with personal safe, seating area with sofas including a sofa bed for one child (up to 10 years old), desk, flat screen TV, fridge, hairdryer and telephone. Complete with a private balcony with wooden parquet, patio furniture and floor-to-ceiling glass door. Capture passing ocean scenes through your large panoramic window while relaxing in the armchairs of the seating area.
RIVIERA SUITE WITH 1 SPARE BED (DECK 6)

Description.Title: Cabins description
Description.Text: Spacious and comfortable suite equipped with two single beds or one double bed, storage spaces, marbled bathroom with walk-in shower, dressing room with personal safe, seating area with sofas, desk, flat screen TV, fridge, hairdryer and telephone. Complete with a private balcony with wooden parquet, patio furniture and floor-to-ceiling glass door. Capture passing ocean scenes through your large panoramic window while relaxing in the armchairs of the seating area.
RIVIERA SUITE (DECK 6)
MV La Belle des Ocans

The MV La Belle des Océans is the second maritime vessel of the CroisiEurope fleet and will sail from Singapore to Quebec during a series of repositioning cruises before reaching its final destination along the Saint Lawrence River.

Description.Title: EQUIPMENTS
Description.Text:
• Storage draws
  • Marbled bathroom with walk-in shower
  • Fitted wardrobe with personal safe
  • Writing desk
  • Flat-screen TV
  • Refrigerator
  • Hair dryer
  • Radio alarm clock with iPod docking station
  • Phone
  • 110-volts outlets only
  • Unlimited standard WiFi
  • Independent air-conditioning
  • Telephone (for internal calls only)

MS Loire Princesse
The MS Loire Princesse cruises on the Loire River between Saint-Nazaire and Angers.
